ygData.subject: Re: The Rescue
ygData.msgSnippet: Tavatron almost dropped her sword, she couldn t believe her eyes. There, leaning against the wall just as relaxed as ever, was Dinobot. At first she thought

Tavatron almost dropped her sword, she couldn't believe her eyes. 
There, leaning against the wall just as relaxed as ever, was Dinobot. 
At first she thought this was some sort of an Alliance trick, a 
hologram of sorts meant to lower her guard. Still, Dark One WAS lying 
in a puddle of his own fluid, and there was only one 'bot in the
world 
she new of who could act this casual after slagging someone. 

With a sigh of relief Tavatron sheathed her sword and jumped off the 
table, landing with a soft thud beside Dinobot. Her optics were still 
damaged, but other than that she was in as good of shape as any 'bot 
who had been bombarded by weapons fire and threatened with torture. 
The relief to see Dinobot was clearly written on her face, though her 
voice sounded otherwise:

"You know, one of these days your going to get yourself killed. By
the 
Matrix what were you thinking?! This mission is suicide! Primus, you 
could STILL get killed!"

Tavatron snarled softly, a small groan escaping her lips. She wasn't 
angry, and finally her relief did get the better of her. She was glad 
he had come for her, deep down she was afraid no one was ever going
to 
come. In a moment she may soon come to regret Tavatron threw her arms 
around Dinobot's neck. He may despise physical contact, but at that 
moment she really didn't care:

"Primus, am I glad to see you."

Her voice was filled with relief as she removed her arms from around 
his neck. She looked up at him, her fur was still singed and
blackened 
in some places, but her internal repairs had managed to fix the 
majority of damage. She then remembered that she had not been the
only 
prisoner in the room, and quickly turned to search for Iron Raptor. 
Finding that she was not present in the room, Tavatron turned back to 
Dinobot, a puzzled expression on her face:

"Where's Iron Raptor?"
